reviewText: I purchased this DVD to increase my knowledge of Paraffin treatments and it didn't disappoint.  I do messages and have had a lot of request of added treatment with paraffin being one of the front runners.  This DVD had more information than u could ever imagine.  I believe even if you have never heard of a paraffin treatment you could do one after this DVD.  If you have people that need to be trained or just learning yourself this is a must have reference.
